com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils

Class Ray<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.utils.Ray<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of vector, either 2D or 3D, implementing the Vector interface

    public class Ray<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A Ray is made up of a starting point and an ending point.
